name: IntelliJ
overview: Interact with feature flags from within IntelliJ-based IDEs.
description: With this plugin, you'll be able to view feature flag details when you hover over a feature flag key in your source code, view all of your flags in a tool window and more -- all within IntelliJ!
details: IntelliJ is a platform developed by JetBrains for IDEs and language-aware developer tools. Interact with feature flags from within IntelliJ.
author: LaunchDarkly
